claimCompound(address,bool,uint256).details: Can be auto compound or manual compound

params._execute: whether to execute txn, or just quote (expected amount out for bounty executor)
params._slippage: that shouldn't be exceeded when performing swaps

params._baseToken: Address of pair asset of PRNT LP

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._slippage: that shouldn't be exceeded when performing swaps

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

MAX_SLIPPAGE_LIMIT.details: The max slippage should be equal to the max slippage of the LockZap contract, otherwise transactions could revert

BountyManagerUpdated(address).notice: Emitted when bounty manager is updated

CompoundFeeUpdated(uint256).notice: Emitted when compounding fee is updated

SlippageLimitUpdated(uint256).notice: Emitted when slippage limit is updated

MAX_SLIPPAGE_LIMIT().notice: The maximum slippage limit that can be set by admins

PERCENT_DIVISOR().notice: Percent divisor which is equal to 100%

addressProvider().notice: Lending Pool Addresses Provider contract address

autocompoundThreshold().notice: Returns minimum stake amount in ETH

baseToken().notice: Token that PRNT is paired with in LP

isEligibleForAutoCompound(address,uint25.notice: Returns if user is eligbile for auto compounding

isEligibleForCompound(uint256).notice: Returns if pending amount is elgible for auto compounding

rewardToBaseRoute(address,uint256).notice: Swap route from rewardToken to baseToken

selfEligibleCompound().notice: Returns if the `msg.sender` is eligible for self compound

userEligibleForCompound(address).notice: Returns if the user is eligible for auto compound

viewPendingRewards(address).notice: Returns the pending rewards of the `_user`
